content: 26 2017 - page 4 of 13 increase-over-big-fan = skip 1st treble_crochet single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet skip 3rd treble_crochet fan in half_double_crochet skip 4th treble_crochet single_crochet in 5th treble_crochet skip 6th treble_crochet row 4 increase-over-big-fan row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet-in-fan fan-in-single_crochet increase-over-big-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan center fan-in-single_crochet increase-over-big-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan fan around tch 8 fans row 5 normal fan row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet-in- fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan through last fan fan around tch 9 fans 4-row repeat sequence begins row 6 normal fan row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet-in-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan through last fan fan around tch 10 fans or +1 fan single_crochet at center row 7 big-fan-row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet-in-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan to single_crochet before marked center single_crochet big-fan in next single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan fan in center single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan big-fan in next single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan through last fan fan around tch 9 fans 2 big-fans or + 1 fan row 8 increase-over-big-fan row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet- in-fan fan-in-single_crochet to big-fan increase-over-big-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet- treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 5 of 13 in-fan center fan-in-single_crochet increase-over-big-fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in- fan fan around tch 14 fans or + 3 fans row 9 normal fan row repeat row 6 fan will be at center 15 fans or + 1 fan repeat row 6-9 until section 1 is of desired size ending after a row 9 with fan at center each repeat of row 6-9 adds 6 fans i did the above repeat 4 more times my section 1 was 25 row deep ending with 39 fans treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 6 of 13 section 2 triangle row alternating with fan row last row was a normal fan row from section 1 with a fan at center tt = treble triangle = treble_crochet ch2 treble_crochet worked in same st fan-in-tt = work a fan in ch2-space at center of tt between the trebles row 1 normal tt over fan row ch6 turn tt in 5th chain from hook ch2 single_crochet-in-fan ch2 tt in next single_crochet ch2 single_crochet-in-fan ch2 through last fan tt around tch center has a single_crochet tts = fans + 1 when working a fan or big-fan in tt work it around the ch2-space between the trebles of the tt row 2 big-fan-on-tt row ch6 turn fan in 5th chain from hook single_crochet in next chain fan in tt single_crochet in next single_crochet to 2 tt before center big-fan in tt single_crochet in single_crochet fan in tt before center single_crochet single_crochet in center single_crochet fan in next tt single_crochet in single_crochet big-fan in next tt single_crochet in next single_crochet fan in tt through last tt single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of tt fan around tch center has a single_crochet fans = tt + 2 tt-over-big-fan = skip 1st treble_crochet single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet ch2 skip 3rd treble_crochet tt in
